sources.title: 1935 - The Glass Key - La llave de cristal - Frank Tuttle
sources.description: 1935 - The Glass Key - La llave de cristal - Frank Tuttle

metadata.Plot: Ed Beaumont is the personal friend, advisor and bodyguard to Paul Madvig, the political boss of a large city. When a mysterious murder is committed---the son of a Madvig political opponent---Madvig's enemies try to pin the crime on him because he is waging a clean-up campaign they oppose. Ed risks his life and his reputation to find the killer and clear his friend.
metadata.Writer: Dashiell Hammett, Kathryn Scola, Kubec Glasmon
metadata.Actors: George Raft, Claire Dodd, Edward Arnold
